item.title: ‘He Finally Shot the Hostage’: Trump’s Trade War Is a Brutal Reality Check
item.description: Trump imposing new tariffs on top of broader policy uncertainty will mean a hit to growth. The question is how large of a hit it will ultimately be.

item.title: What Antitrust ‘Reformers’ Got Wrong
item.description: Lina Khan and her allies tried to remake antitrust law. Trump’s team is likely putting an end to that.

item.title: 7 things to watch for during Trump’s joint address to Congress
item.description: Look for a more emboldened president compared to the Trump of 2017.

item.title: Beijing’s deflation dilemma: Falling prices signal bigger troubles ahead for China’s economy
item.description: Such challenges are the backdrop to the annual session of China’s parliament.

item.title: Rep. Adrian Smith: US needs to be 'aggressive and effective' with tariffs
